title: Parasites and Lovers, It Sucks To Be In Love...
description: Parasites and Lovers is the first book in the Vampires and Lovers series, which chronicles decades in the lives of a family, and the consequences of their not so voluntary association with vampires.Jemma Lane doesn't think her life can get any worse, until she accidentally releases a vengeful vampire from a metal trunk. Paulus Casarea is cold, dead, and strikingly handsome. He's also on the hunt for his undead girlfriend, Catherine, and revenge.Sarah Mitchell doesn't believe in vampires, but that changes the night she meets blonde and charming, Alexander Finstad, who seduces the na√Øve teenager into becoming his personal blood bank.Both girls soon realize their troubles have only just begun. These vampires are oh so naughty...and not very nice at all.84,000 wordsThe vampire drama continues with The Vampire and the Rose and The Lady is a Vampire, available now.
author: Yvonne Anthony
